short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make it simple to leverage the power of the Clinch CRM no matter where they are engaging with candidates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Clinch Sourcing Companion makes it simple for Sourcers, Recruiters and other Talent Acquisition professionals to leverage the power of the Clinch CRM no matter where they are engaging with candidates.

Easily add new candidates to your CRM database directly from the Sourcing Companion, and then utilize Clinchâ€™s powerful candidate engagement tools to effortlessly nurture those prospects without ever leaving the Sourcing Companion.
